00021 enum VoiceKeyTypes
00022   {
00023     VKT_NONE = 0,
00024     VKT_ENERGY = 1,
00025     VKT_SIGN_CHANGES_LOW = 2,
00026     VKT_SIGN_CHANGES_HIGH = 4,
00027     VKT_DIRECTION_CHANGES_LOW = 8,
00028     VKT_DIRECTION_CHANGES_HIGH = 16
00029   };

00065    double mThresholdSignChangesUpper;

00077    double mSilentWindowSize;           //Time in milliseconds of below-threshold windows required for silence
00078    double mSignalWindowSize;           //Time in milliseconds of above-threshold windows required for speech

00094 inline int sgn(int  number){ return (number<0) ? -1: 1;};
00095 
00096 //This returns a logistic density based on a z-score
00097 // a logistic distn has variance (pi*s)^2/3
00098 
00099 //inline float inline float logistic(float z){   return fexp(-1 * z/(pi / sqrt(3)) / (1 + pow(fexp(-1 * z(pi / sqrt(3))),2)));};
